title: Products
description: Introducing SALIX Life's innovative respiratory product line. Meet various products including portable respirators, in-ear type respirators, and connecting hoses.

features.capacity: 50x large capacity based on 200cc basic product, 50x more oxygen than competitors
features.price: Proprietary 3-stage dispenser and carbon composite material, ultra-compact, ultra-lightweight innovation
features.design: Modern, retro-futuristic design for all generations
features.control: World's first ultra-lightweight portable oxygen 3-stage precision flow control

innovations.title: 50x Large Capacity Innovation
innovations.description: 40L large capacity, up to 50x more oxygen than competitors, 2 hours continuous supply possible

innovations.title: Eco-friendly, Economic Innovation
innovations.description: Eco-friendly business model, innovation that doesn't restrict existing oxygen users' activities

innovations.title: Retro-futuristic In-ear Oxygen Supplier
innovations.description: In-ear type nasal supplier, ultra-lightweight composite high-pressure container

innovations.title: 3-stage Precision Flow Control
innovations.description: World's first 3-stage precision flow control for portable oxygen, customized supply by purpose

device.name: SALIX O2 Cylinder
device.subtitle: Salix Trek-Safe Oxygen
device.description: An innovative respiratory device that can be immediately utilized in fire scenes, confined spaces, high altitudes, medical emergency situations, etc.
features: Trekking user location tracking and safety alerts update planned

deviceear.name: In-ear Respirator
deviceear.subtitle: Compact Ear-fit Design
deviceear.description: An ultra-compact respiratory aid device designed so you don't feel stuffy during daily life.
features: Continuous use time advantage over existing portable oxygen

devicecontact.name: Connection Hose
devicecontact.subtitle: Professional Connection
devicecontact.description: Connects SALIX O2 cylinder and in-ear respirator for more stable oxygen supply.
